US federal aviation agency FAA Recommends
Boin 737 900 Airline Operators Check
Directly
This recommendation
was made after the Alaska Airlines Boin 737 max
9 aircraft had its
door latch released during
flight. Indicates that the Boin 737 900
e and  The 737 max 9 has the same door latch design.
The agency recommends that
airlines check the four bolts in the
fuselage door latch as soon as
possible. The FAA also issued a safety warning

usually increases dramatically this year,
but according to experts, this
may change in the year 2024.
One of the reasons is said to be the
gloomy economic development
in China and  In other countries following the lunar

2024 The biggest problem affecting
China's birth rate today is the
lack of confidence and uncertainty about the
future that many Chinese people believe they
are facing.  a decade of
lost income so they don't feel
they can afford to raise a child and

greatly affect the goals that this country has achieved.
A company in Nigeria has given a
second life to discarded car tires
by turning them into construction bricks,
floor tiles and flip-flops.
Free RES company in Nigeria has
recycled more than 400,000 old tires into
New products Recycled products are
very diverse, the most popular being
rubber tiles.
Just walking on the street for 5 minutes, you
can easily see about 10 abandoned vehicles,
they are very harmful to the environment.  environment
because over time tires cannot
biodegrade, they are easily burned
or trapped in water pipes, making nests
for noses and parasites.
Now we can turn them into
building materials.  built for reuse. And
even sustainable fashion products like
flip-flops,
after collecting old tires, the factory
crushes them into small pieces.
Then they mix them with adhesives and
shape them into different shapes.
Free recycle company products said that recycling
old tires helps prevent more than 8,100 tons of
CO2 gas from being released into the
environment. Even though Christmas and New Year have
